selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract text labels associated with each cat from the image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract text labels from the image.

new_skill_specs.name: compare_cat_sizes_from_labels
new_skill_specs.purpose: Compare the sizes of cats based on the extracted text labels and identify the largest cat.
inputs: A list of text labels extracted from the image.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The exact content of the correct choice indicating the largest cat.
edge_cases: If labels do not clearly indicate size, return an error or request clarification.
